interestingFact: Fantasia has floating islands that move with the wind.
Zetronia's capital city is entirely powered by solar energy.
Elveria has the world's largest underground river system.
Lumoria is known for its bioluminescent beaches.
Draconis has an annual festival where people build giant dragon-shaped kites.
Verdantia is home to a massive ancient tree that is over 5,000 years old.
Aetheria has a floating city suspended by advanced anti-gravity technology.
Nocturnia experiences almost 20 hours of darkness during winter.
Atlantis is a technologically advanced underwater civilization.
